attributes.action: Empower the opposition leader to set up an inquiry everytime Britain goes to war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that in the future an inquiry into why any conflict involving British service personnel has started should be automatic and impossible to avoid.

The leader of the opposition should have the power to set the terms and appoint the personnel required.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/iraq-war/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
